about_the_game:
Couch Multiplayer

Inspired by our memories crowding around the computer with friends. We want to bring people together, so gather your crew!

Simple, Satisfying Controls

We obsessed over making the controls simple, intuitive, satisfying, with depth and just plain fun. Easy to pick up, whether you're new to games or seasoned, you can still compete and have a blast.

Endlessly Replayable

Destructible terrain and dynamic water adds layers of depth and surprise. Enabling use of really clever tactics to outmaneuver opponents, like drilling through your friend's cover.

Plus, we also made a fancy deck-builder upgrade system that introduces cool new weapons, and endless possibilities, ensuring no two matches are ever the same.
detailed_description:
Alpha Demo

This game is in development, but please enjoy our early look demo! 🎉


About the Game

Couch Multiplayer

Inspired by our memories crowding around the computer with friends. We want to bring people together, so gather your crew!

Simple, Satisfying Controls

We obsessed over making the controls simple, intuitive, satisfying, with depth and just plain fun. Easy to pick up, whether you're new to games or seasoned, you can still compete and have a blast.

Endlessly Replayable

Destructible terrain and dynamic water adds layers of depth and surprise. Enabling use of really clever tactics to outmaneuver opponents, like drilling through your friend's cover.

Plus, we also made a fancy deck-builder upgrade system that introduces cool new weapons, and endless possibilities, ensuring no two matches are ever the same.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1650 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13.6 or newer
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.13.6 or newer
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Cow Chess

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 1 64 bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1650 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: We poured our hearts into hand-crafting a real-time artillery party game that is really really fun. Featuring fluid movement, punchy weapons, and fully destructible terrain.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
